label: 顕広王記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: A little-used diary written by prince Akihiro, a sixth-generation of Emperor Kazan who was adopted by a mid-ranking Minamoto. Akihiro served at the Jingikan (Department of Divine Affairs), and his diary, which unfortunately is scattered and incomplete, contains entries for the years 1161-1178
